synopsis.text: Episode one of "Bloody Bear" premiered on Abema TV on September 19, 2020, with regular broadcasting commencing on October 7, 2020. The anime follows the story of Yuna, an affluent 15-year-old who made her fortune playing the stock market. Yuna is a recluse who spends her days playing her favorite VRMMO game, World Fantasy Online. Her life takes a turn when a new update provides her with a rare bear outfit that possesses overpowered abilities. Although she finds the outfit adorable, she is hesitant to wear it due to embarrassment. However, Yuna soon finds herself transported into the game world, where she must confront monsters and magic. The bear outfit becomes her most powerful weapon, and she quickly gains a reputation as 'Bloody Bear.' Yuna sets out to explore this new world, rescue new friends, and embrace her new life as an adventurer.
